price: ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ߸ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ߥߙߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߥߐ߬ߦߐ
arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: bali alladhīna kafarū fī ʿizzatin washiqāqin
